title: Second best
excerpt: You can get a lot of mileage out of striving for the next best thing.

children.text: You can get a lot of mileage out of striving for the next best thing.
Consider: the next best thing from dating a movie star is to be someone who they’d wish they could spend more time with.
And the next best thing from being a child’s parent is for
Similarly, a homemade meal, made with care, is often just as good as anything you eat from a celebrity chef.
And an imperfect solution that lasts is often more preferable to a “perfect one” that isn’t sustainable.
Sometimes it pays to settle for second best.
